name: Doom 2 overpowered allies and fun times
name_original: Doom 2 overpowered allies and fun times
description:
You are a floating entity in the world of doom2yness and you can summon allies so powerful that they can singlehandedly destroy a map by themselves like a Russian Overkill class!

Recommended to play with maps such as the nuts trilogy, holy hell, and other slaughterfest wads!
